Desc.eng: Don't hurt me, stranger! I'm just an old man with severe hair loss and skin problems! Everyone takes me for a ghoul. Can you imagine that?
Do you know why is that? Because you are a ghoul!
Please, believe me! If you could give me a hat to cover my ugly head and a spare change to buy some clothes I'd pass for a decent mortal.
Well said! You'd pass for a mortal and find new victims.
I have some provisions left. What'd you like to eat?
That's really kind of you, sir. I could kill for a slab of rare meatâ€¦ or a juicy eyeball... hmm... Heavens. I'm really a ghoul, aren't I? Rarrgh?... Raargh!!!
Here you are. A hat and some money. Pull yourself together, old man.
Such a gracious man! Thank you, sir!
